userResponse.option: Greetings! I hope you can spare some time to help out an SWS agent!

phase.text: An SWS agent, are ya? We don’t get many of those around here! But with all the funny business going on I’m not surprised you’re here.

userResponse.option: I’m following a potentially dangerous criminal! Have you seen anyone strange around here?
Funny business? What have you seen?

phase.text: Me, I’m just a humble fisherman. Nothing exciting, I’m afraid. But you look like you might be up to something…

userResponse.option: I’m an SWS agent and I’m looking for a thief.
I’m on a mission for the SWS. Seen anything suspicious lately?

phase.text: There’s some mighty creepy characters that’ve been hanging around an island not far from here. But me, I just mind my own business and try not to get involved.

userResponse.option: Any information you can tell me might be important.
That’s probably wise. But a brave agent like me has nothing to fear.

phase.text: There’s an old hermit who lives on an island around here who probably knows a lot more than I do. Right now, I’m a lot more concerned that I’m not catching the fish I need for my stew!
phase.textOnReturn: Oh, so you’re ready to help me now? Tell you what, if you help me get this fire started, find me some better bait and cook up a nice fish stew, you can take some of the stew over to the Hermit to see if you can win him over.

userResponse.option: Hmm, it looks like you could use some different bait!
I’ve got more important things to do than hang around fishing!

phase.text: Ehhh… Do you think so? Tell you what, if you help me get this fire started, find me some better bait and cook up a nice fish stew, you can take some of the stew over to the Hermit to see if you can win him over.
Still… I don’t know if you’ll get to his island in that dinky little boat of yours. There’s a mightily clever mechanic on one of these islands who might be able to give you a hand.
I don’t see any fish stew yet! We’re going to need a fire and at least 5 kinds of fish.
Thanks! Wow, that bait really did work!! Next, we need to get that fire started before adding the fish.
Nice work on that fire. Now all we need is to start cooking that lovely fish.
I can’t thank you enough. Good luck finding the Hermit, I’m sure this stew you made will bring him out of his cave!
phase.textOnReturn: You’re not going to get anywhere with the hermit unless you bring him some food! Take him a coconut shell full of stew!

phase.text: Well? Did he like the stew? I told you that he would love it! Good luck with your mission.
phase.textOnReturn: Welcome back! Feel free to explore the islands and relax on the beach!

phase.text: Hey! Leave that alone! Why don’t you help me out first and then you can come back for any supplies you need from my island.
There's no point starting that fire until all the fish have been caught!
You’ll need my help if you want to talk to that hermit, so you’d better change your attitude!
